attributes.action: disband all regional assemblies in england
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as usual ,the government,has tried to create unelected regional assemblies through the back door,without being elected.
considering they will not permit an english parliament,to alleviate the lothian question,but even though the north east rejected the idea,by vote,they are still pressing ahead,by squandering the publics money on an unelected tier of government.
i petition the government to stop funding
    * East of England Regional Assembly
    * East Midlands Regional Assembly
    * London Assembly
    * North East Assembly
    * North West Regional Assembly
    * South East England Regional Assembly
    * South West Regional Assembly
    * West Midlands Regional Assembly
    * Yorkshire and Humber Assembly

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/regionalquangos/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
